title: 90-Day Progress Check-In
description: Share your AI journey progress 90 days after course completion.

questions.question: How often are you using AI tools in your daily work?
Rate the impact AI tools have had on your productivity
Which of the following have you used AI for? (Select all that apply)
Share a success story or notable win you've had using AI
questions.placeholder: Tell us about a time when AI helped you achieve something meaningful...

questions.question: How much have your AI skills improved since the course?
Has the AI training impacted your career?
options: Yes, I changed roles to focus on AI
Yes, I took on new AI-related responsibilities
Not yet, but I'm exploring opportunities

questions.question: Have you continued learning about AI beyond the course?
If yes, what resources or courses have you used for continued learning?
questions.placeholder: List any books, courses, websites, or other resources...
